311.movie_plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

33.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
33.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

254.movie_plot: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

264.movie_plot: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

123.movie_plot: The story of a girl who is willing to do anything to become Valedictorian, even if it means murdering the teacher that stands in her way.

5.movie_name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)
5.movie_plot: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

80.movie_plot: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

53.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

128.movie_plot: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

27.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

207.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
207.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

187.movie_plot: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

102.movie_plot: A mute woman is sent to 1850s New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

42.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

266.movie_plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

157.movie_plot: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

200.movie_plot: Producers Max Bialystock and Leo Bloom make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

175.movie_plot: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

67.movie_plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

59.movie_plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

246.movie_plot: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.

94.movie_plot: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

65.movie_plot: Ted Kramer's wife leaves her husband, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son, deepening the wounds left by the separation.

237.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

111.movie_plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.

91.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

163.movie_plot: After a daughter witnesses her father having an affair, she begins a chain reaction that could tear her family apart.

143.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

11.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

17.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

57.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
57.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

109.movie_plot: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

126.movie_plot: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

239.movie_plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

119.movie_plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

8.movie_plot: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

181.movie_plot: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she brought along an unwelcome visitor.

270.movie_plot: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

82.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
82.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

117.movie_plot: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

172.movie_plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

225.movie_plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

204.movie_plot: A simple, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.

49.movie_name: Like Water for Chocolate (Como agua para chocolate) (1992)
49.movie_plot: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

171.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

60.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

223.movie_plot: In Africa during World War I, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

92.movie_plot: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to the mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.

153.movie_plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

26.movie_plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

18.movie_plot: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

122.movie_plot: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.

100.movie_plot: When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

28.movie_plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

160.movie_plot: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny, to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles, before confirming his orders to do so.

259.movie_plot: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

235.movie_plot: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

114.movie_plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?

212.movie_plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

197.movie_plot: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

222.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

149.movie_plot: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

154.movie_plot: A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

262.movie_plot: Ben and Katie Jordan are a married couple who go through hard times in fifteen years of marriage.

250.movie_plot: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

61.movie_plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

145.movie_plot: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

177.movie_plot: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college, and one of their cousins--an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules and manners--comes in to defend them.

66.movie_plot: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

72.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

56.movie_plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

132.movie_plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home cause confusion.

6.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

263.movie_plot: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

138.movie_plot: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

43.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
43.movie_plot: After an accidental encounter with otherworldly vessels, an ordinary man follows a series of psychic clues to the first scheduled meeting between representatives of Earth and visitors from the cosmos.

45.movie_plot: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone who must continue her battle against the aliens. Along with a crew of space pirates, Ripley must also prevent the deadly aliens from reaching Earth.

78.movie_plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

208.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
208.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

106.movie_plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

96.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

35.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

10.movie_plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

136.movie_plot: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.

221.movie_plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

170.movie_plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

110.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

194.movie_name: All Quiet on the Western Front (1930)
194.movie_plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

75.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

76.movie_plot: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

39.movie_plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

176.movie_plot: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

209.movie_plot: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

107.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

69.movie_plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.

147.movie_plot: Paulie, a talking parrot, recounts his travels looking for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.

4.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

213.movie_plot: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

58.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

29.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
29.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

112.movie_plot: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

139.movie_plot: An off the charts genius who is home schooled and shunned after his last relative dies shows the unconscious residents of his town about connection awareness and the generosity of the spirit.

211.movie_plot: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.

135.movie_plot: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

87.movie_plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

196.movie_plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

1.movie_plot: A misogynistic and snobbish phonetics professor agrees to a wager that he can take a flower girl and make her presentable in high society.

164.movie_plot: A perfect red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

210.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)

104.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

24.movie_plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

148.movie_plot: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

113.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

131.movie_plot: Armed with a license to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007, and must defeat a private banker to terrorists in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro, but things are not what they seem.

214.movie_plot: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

227.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)

189.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

25.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

156.movie_plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.

184.movie_name: Treasure of the Sierra Madre, The (1948)
184.movie_plot: Fred Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

19.movie_plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

257.movie_plot: When twelve mysterious spacecrafts appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.

93.movie_plot: A local sheriff, a marine biologist and an old seafarer team up to hunt down a great white shark wrecking havoc in a beach resort.

3.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

127.movie_plot: An insomniac office worker, looking for a way to change his life, crosses paths with a devil-may-care soapmaker, forming an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

95.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

21.movie_plot: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

180.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

134.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

108.movie_plot: An exploration of how completely different the television series is from the film. The cast and filmmakers underwent quite a change in order to create the film X Files, The (1998). We are ...

146.movie_plot: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

54.movie_plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

101.movie_plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

159.movie_plot: A partially idealized and fictionalized film of the controversial pornography publisher and how he became a defender of free speech for all people.

32.movie_plot: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

205.movie_plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

182.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

267.movie_plot: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery.

271.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

244.movie_plot: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life, told in an anachronistic manner.

89.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

260.movie_plot: The families of children who died, sue two companies for dumping toxic waste: a tort so expensive to prove, the case could bankrupt their lawyers.

218.movie_plot: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

242.movie_plot: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

71.movie_plot: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

240.movie_plot: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

116.movie_plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

188.movie_plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

166.movie_plot: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for president of the USA.

272.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.
